item.title: Coding: API readability/testability
item.description: About a month ago or so I described how we did some work to ensure that we were calling a class the same way in our tests as in our production code and while I think that was a good choice in that situation we came across a similar problem this week where we weren’t so sure. The piece of code in question was being used to create the view model for a page and one of the pieces of data that we wanted to show on this page was the date on which something would be valid which is currently today’s date.
